gcci.text: H100 supply remains tight as hyperscalers and large enterprises hoard capacity, keeping spot prices like $3.23/hr elevated despite capex ramp constraints.

gtpi.text: DeepSeek's $1.25/1M input price catalyzes API price wars that compress margins and drive model efficiency gains to win share.

gagl.text: AI workloads' 120 TWh/year load strains grids and accelerates nuclear and demand-response adoption to stabilize carbon footprints.

aipi.text: Macro sentiment is cautiously bullish with strong capex but growing bubble risk as power constraints and slower deployments temper near-term growth.
